an10.222:4.1: “Vīsatiyā, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an10.222:4.3: Attanā ca pāṇātipātī hoti, parañca pāṇātipāte samādapeti;
an10.222:4.4: attanā ca adinnādāyī hoti, parañca adinnādāne samādapeti;
an10.222:4.5: attanā ca kāmesumicchācārī hoti, parañca kāmesumicchācāre samādapeti;
an10.222:4.6: attanā ca musāvādī hoti, parañca musāvāde samādapeti;
an10.222:4.7: attanā ca pisuṇavāco hoti, parañca pisuṇāya vācāya samādapeti;
an10.222:4.8: attanā ca pharusavāco hoti, parañca pharusāya vācāya samādapeti;
an10.222:4.9: attanā ca samphappalāpī hoti, parañca samphappalāpe samādapeti;
an10.222:4.10: attanā ca abhijjhālu hoti, parañca abhijjhāya samādapeti;
an10.222:4.11: attanā ca byāpannacitto hoti, parañca byāpāde samādapeti;
an10.222:4.12: attanā ca micchādiṭṭhiko hoti, parañca micchādiṭṭhiyā samādapeti—
an10.222:4.13: imehi kho, bhikkhave, vīsatiyā dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an10.222:5.1: Vīsatiyā, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
an10.222:5.3: Attanā ca pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, parañca pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an10.222:5.4: attanā ca adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, parañca adinnādānā veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an10.222:5.5: attanā ca kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, parañca kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an10.222:5.6: attanā ca musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, parañca musāvādā veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an10.222:5.7: attanā ca pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, parañca pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an10.222:5.8: attanā ca pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, parañca pharusāya vācāya veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an10.222:5.9: attanā ca samphappalāpā paṭivirato hoti, parañca samphappalāpā veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an10.222:5.10: attanā ca anabhijjhālu hoti, parañca anabhijjhāya samādapeti;
an10.222:5.11: attanā ca abyāpannacitto hoti, parañca abyāpāde samādapeti;
an10.222:5.12: attanā ca sammādiṭṭhiko hoti, parañca sammādiṭṭhiyā samādapeti—
an10.222:5.13: imehi kho, bhikkhave, vīsatiyā dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
